entry.title: Dogs vs. Cats Stamp Portraits Team !

link.title: Dogs vs. Cats Stamp Portraits Team !

entry.content: “That must be the Emerald City,” said Dorothy. As they walked on, the green glow became brighter and brighter,<!–more–> and it seemed that at last they were nearing the end of their travels.The same secludedness and isolation to which the schoolmaster whale betakes himself in his advancing years, is true of all aged Sperm Whales. Almost universally, a lone whale—as a solitary Leviathan is called—proves an ancient one. Like venerable moss-bearded Daniel Boone, he will have no one near him but Nature herself; and her he takes to wife in the wilderness of waters, and the best of wives she is, though she keeps so many moody secrets.
entry.summary: “That must be the Emerald City,” said Dorothy. As they walked on, the green glow became brighter and brighter,
